ai-patthana15.4:0.2_0: Living in the teaching, they are included in the discourses and found, as it’s amazing.
ai-patthana15.4:1.1_0: There is only a reason for the sake of grasping, not because of grasping.
ai-patthana15.4:1.1_1: ‘... for the sake of the three realms.’ ...
ai-patthana15.4:2.1_0: Neither for the sake of investigating, nor for the sake of principles.
ai-patthana15.4:3.1_0: Or for the sake of non-guarding, not because of grasping.
ai-patthana15.4:3.1_1: ‘... for the sake of the three realms.’ ...
